meanings.definition: Covering or spreading with a scattered arrangement of objects or materials.
meanings.sent1: The overstrews garden was filled with colorful flowers and leaves.
meanings.sent2: The room looked cozy with its overstrews blankets and pillows.
meanings.sent3: The overstrews picnic blanket made it hard to find a spot to sit!
meanings.sent4: Her overstrews artwork on the wall added a touch of whimsy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The overstrews confetti at the party created a festive atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Scattering or distributing objects or materials over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She overstrews flower petals along the aisle for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The wind overstrews the fallen leaves across the yard.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally overstrews his toys all over the living room.
meanings.sent4: The chef overstrews herbs on top of the dish for added flavor.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully overstrews paint on the canvas to create a masterpiece.
